moylish_campus.description: TUS Moylish Campus offers various parking options for students, staff, and visitors. The campus can be accessed by car through two main entrances: the main entrance off the Old Cratloe Road and a second entrance off the Cratloe Road Roundabout.

free_parking.address: Corrib Drive, Gate 5 and 6, beside Chill The Beans coffee shop, V94 CF77
free_parking.details: Free parking available; entrance through gates 5 and 6.
Free parking available for TUS students and staff.
Free parking with a shuttle bus service operating between TUS Coonagh Campus and TUS Moylish Campus.

paid_parking.details: Paid parking is available on campus. Users must park in officially marked spaces, pay for a ticket, and ensure it is clearly displayed.
violations: Parking in a Disabled Person’s parking bay without authorization.
Parking in Staff Car Park without a Staff Permit.
Failure to display a valid ‘Pay and Display’ parking ticket or to have paid by text.

moylish_campus.additional_information: TUS Moylish is located in a residential area; please respect our neighbors at all times.

contact_information.address: Moylish Campus, Moylish Park, Limerick, V94 EC5T
